Select Ability Dialog Box

Requires: Professional System

In the Project Explorer window, right-click an XControl library and select New»Ability from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to add abilities to an XControl library.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Abilities—Lists the abilities that are available for an XControl and specifies which abilities are required or optional. Select the name of an ability and click the Add button to add the ability to the XControl library.
  • Description—Describes the XControl ability.
